snippet: Raphael Martinetti’s resignation as head of the international wrestling federation comes in the wake of the International Olympic Committee’s decision to remove the sport from the 2020 Olympics.
abstract: FILA president Raphael Martinetti resigns in wake of International Olympic Committee’s decision to remove wrestling from Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Raphael Martinetti’s resignation as head of the international wrestling federation comes in the wake of the International Olympic Committee’s decision to remove the sport from the 2020 Olympics.

headline.main: Wrestling Group’s President Quits After Olympic Omission
